description:
use group4/Modules/06 Angular/Assignments/13/angular13

Server Side

serve the client-side application using express.static middleware.

create a highscore which contains the top ten players who have the biggest amount of correct answers.

Client Side

display the highscore from the server when the game ends.

on submitting a quiz - check if the score is in top ten. if it does, open a form and ask the player to enter his/her name.

submitting the name should add the player's name and the amount of correct answers to the highscore.

Bonus #1

add an administrator area for managing the quiz.

the area should allow adding, removing and editing questions and answers.

Bonus #2

restrict access to the administrator area using the username "admin" and the password "Admin!234".
